data.Sentence_cn: “绿林少年”是一个流行歌曲演唱团。
data.Sentence: The Greenwood Boys are a group of pop singers.

data.Sentence_cn: 目前他们正在全国各地巡回演出，
data.Sentence: At present, they are visiting all parts of the country.
They will be arriving here tomorrow.

data.Sentence_cn: 他们将乘火车来，镇上的大部分青年人将到车站迎接他们。
data.Sentence: They will be coming by train and most of the young people in the town will be meeting them at the station.

data.Sentence_cn: 明晚他们将在工人俱乐部演出。
data.Sentence: Tomorrow evening they will be singing at the Workers' Club.
The Greenwood Boys will be staying for five days.

data.Sentence_cn: 在此期间，他们将演出5场。
data.Sentence: During this time, they will give five performances.

data.Sentence_cn: 同往常一样，警察的日子将不好过，
data.Sentence: As usual, the police will have a difficult time.
They will be trying to keep order.

data.Sentence_cn: 每逢这种场合，情况都是这样。
data.Sentence: It is always the same on these occasions.
